common.offline: You are offline. Some features may not be available.

editor.title: Markdown Editor
editor.placeholder:
Start typing your markdown here...

# Welcome

This is a **markdown** editor with _live preview_.

## Features

- Real-time preview
- Syntax highlighting
- Multiple themes
- PDF export

toolbar.fullscreenHint: Press Escape or F11 to exit

recovery.title: Recover unsaved work?
recovery.description: We found unsaved content from your last session. Would you like to recover it?

builtIn.githubDesc: Clean and familiar GitHub markdown style

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Integrate Markdown to PDF conversion in your applications
apiDocs.introText: The Markdown to PDF API allows you to convert markdown content to PDF documents programmatically.
apiDocs.authText: No authentication required for basic usage. Rate limits apply.

errors.title: Error Codes
errors.429: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

convertEndpoint.title: Convert Markdown to PDF
convertEndpoint.desc: Convert markdown content to a PDF document

previewEndpoint.title: Generate Preview
previewEndpoint.desc: Generate HTML preview of markdown content

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.emptyContent: Content is empty. Please add some markdown.

footer.copyright: © {year} Markdown to PDF. All rights reserved.

meta.homeTitle: Markdown to PDF - Convert Markdown to PDF Online
meta.homeDesc: Free online Markdown to PDF converter with live preview, syntax highlighting, multiple themes, and more.

subscription.title: Subscription

subscription.cancelDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?

subscription.setDefaultError: Failed to set default payment method

subscription.pauseDescription: Pausing your subscription will temporarily stop billing while retaining your plan.

subscription.pauseWarning3: You can resume your subscription at any time

subscription.prorationNotice: You will be charged a prorated amount of ${amount} for the remainder of this billing period.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Manage your teams and collaborate with others
teams.noTeamsDescription: You're not a member of any teams. Create a team or get invited to one to start collaborating.
teams.upgradeRequired: Team features require a Team or Enterprise plan
teams.upgradeDescription: Upgrade your plan to create and manage teams with shared settings and storage.
teams.createTeamDescription: Teams allow you to collaborate with others and share settings, templates, and storage.
teams.createError: Failed to create team. Please try again.

detail.leaveTeamDescription: Are you sure you want to leave this team? You will lose access to shared resources.
detail.removeMemberDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the team?
detail.addMemberDescription: Invite a new member to join your team by email.
detail.name: Name (optional)
detail.roleHint: Admins can add and remove members.
detail.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
detail.settingsDescription: Configure your team settings and preferences.
detail.allowMemberInvitesHint: Members can invite new people to the team.
detail.defaultRoleHint: Role assigned to new members by default.
detail.sharedStorageHint: Team members can access shared cloud storage.
detail.sharedTemplatesHint: Team members can access shared templates.
detail.deleteTeamHint: Permanently delete this team and all its data.
detail.deleteTeamDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone and will remove all members.
detail.transferOwnershipHint: Transfer ownership to an admin. You will become an admin.

invitations.title: Pending Invitations
invitations.cancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation for {email}?

transfer.title: Transfer Ownership
transfer.description: Transfer team ownership to another admin. This action cannot be undone.
transfer.warningItem1: You will become an admin after transfer
transfer.warningItem2: The new owner will have full control of the team
transfer.warningItem3: All your owner privileges will be revoked
transfer.noEligibleMembersHint: Only admins can receive ownership. Promote a member to admin first.
